extendedIngredients.name: celery stalks
extendedIngredients.original: 6 pale inner (white) celery stalks, leaves discarded and stalks thinly sliced
extendedIngredients.originalName: pale inner (white) celery stalks, leaves discarded and stalks thinly sliced

extendedIngredients.name: lemon zest
extendedIngredients.original: 1/2 tablespoon grated lemon zest (preferably from an unwaxed organic lemon)
extendedIngredients.originalName: grated lemon zest (preferably from an unwaxed organic lemon)

title: Fennel and Celery Salad (Dama Bianca)
summary: Fennel and Celery Salad (Dama Bianca) is a gluten free, primal, and vegetarian side dish. This recipe serves 6. One portion of this dish contains roughly 8g of protein, 8g of fat, and a total of 135 calories. For $2.42 per serving, this recipe covers 10% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. If you have buffalo mozzarella, lemon zest, sea salt, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. This recipe is liked by 1 foodies and cooks. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 20 minutes. With a spoonacular score of 51%, this dish is solid. Similar recipes include Pizza Bianca with Scamorzan and Shaved Celery Root, Fennel And Celery Salad, and Celery and Fennel Salad â€“.
instructions: Preparation                                                        Halve fennel lengthwise, then thinly slice crosswise about 1/4 inch thick. Toss with celery and arrange on a platter with mozzarella.                                                                Whisk together zest, juice, oil, sea salt, and 1/4 teaspoon pepper and drizzle over salad.

steps.step: Halve fennel lengthwise, then thinly slice crosswise about 1/4 inch thick. Toss with celery and arrange on a platter with mozzarella.
Whisk together zest, juice, oil, sea salt, and 1/4 teaspoon pepper and drizzle over salad.
